select_delete_mode.zh: 请选择删除方式：全部删除 或 按需删除
select_delete_mode.en: Please choose a deletion mode: delete all or delete selectively

search_node_modules_prompt.zh: 正在搜索项目下所有的 node_modules，请选择要删除的项
search_node_modules_prompt.en: Searching all node_modules in the project; please select the items you want to delete

enter_worker_count_prompt.zh: 请输入开启的 Worker 线程数量 [{{min}}-{{max}}]（直接回车使用默认值 {{default}}）
enter_worker_count_prompt.en: Please enter the number of worker threads to start [{{min}}-{{max}}] (press Enter to use the default: {{default}})

number_out_of_range.zh: 请输入一个介于 {{min}} 到 {{max}} 之间的数字
number_out_of_range.en: Please enter a number between {{min}} and {{max}}

select_dirs_to_delete.zh: 请选择需要删除的目录
select_dirs_to_delete.en: Please select the directories to delete
